remarks: The projective map of the GLB of a set of lattice elements.  Index-set version of ~ pmapglb , where we read ` S ` as ` S ( i ) ` .  Theorem 15.5.2 of [MaedaMaeda] p. 62.  (Contributed by NM, 5-Dec-2011.)
statement:
pmapglb.b $e |- B = ( Base ` K ) $.
pmapglb.g $e |- G = ( glb ` K ) $.
pmapglb.m $e |- M = ( pmap ` K ) $.
pmapglbx $p |- ( ( K e. HL /\ A. i e. I S e. B /\ I =/= (/) ) -> ( M ` ( G ` { y | E. i e. I y = S } ) ) = |^|_ i e. I ( M ` S ) ) $.
$d B i y $.
$d I i y $.
$d K i y $.
$d S y $.
